titleStmt.title: Another order for contribvtions for maymed and diseased souldiers who have been employed under the command of His Excellencie the Earl of Essex in the army set forth by both Houses of Parliament together with an order of the sayd House, for the authorizing of severall persons to make diligent search in their severall precincts for the apprehending and disarming dangerous and suspected persons, and them to bring before the committee of examinations.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

Laws, etc.
